card.name: About Face
card.text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Angelic Curator
card.text: Flying, protection from artifacts

card.name: Angel's Trumpet
card.text: All creatures have vigilance. At the beginning of each player's end step, tap all untapped creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Angel's Trumpet deals damage to the player equal to the number of creatures tapped this way.

card.name: Anthroplasm
card.text: Anthroplasm enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {X}, {T}: Remove all +1/+1 counters from Anthroplasm and put X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Archivist
card.text: {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Aura Flux
card.text: Other enchantments have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this enchantment unless you pay {2}."

card.name: Avalanche Riders
Beast of Burden
card.text: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

card.name: Blessed Reversal
card.text: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.

card.name: Bloated Toad
card.text: Protection from blue Cycling {2}

card.name: Bone Shredder
Bouncing Beebles
card.text: Bouncing Beebles can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.

card.name: Brink of Madness
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have no cards in hand, sacrifice Brink of Madness and target opponent discards his or her hand.

card.name: Burst of Energy
card.text: Untap target permanent.

card.name: Cessation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. When Cessation is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Cessation to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cloud of Faeries
Crawlspace
card.text: No more than two creatures can attack you each combat.

card.name: Crop Rotation
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Crop Rotation, sacrifice a land. Search your library for a land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Damping Engine
card.text: A player who controls more permanents than each other player can't play lands or cast artifact, creature, or enchantment spells. That player may sacrifice a permanent for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

card.name: Darkwatch Elves
card.text: Protection from black Cycling {2}

card.name: Defender of Chaos
card.text: Flash Protection from white

card.name: Defender of Law
card.text: Flash Protection from red

card.name: Defense Grid
card.text: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.

card.name: Defense of the Heart
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, and put those cards onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Delusions of Mediocrity
card.text: When Delusions of Mediocrity enters the battlefield, you gain 10 life. When Delusions of Mediocrity leaves the battlefield, you lose 10 life.

card.name: Deranged Hermit
Devout Harpist
card.text: {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a creature.

card.name: Engineered Plague
card.text: As Engineered Plague enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.

card.name: Erase
card.text: Exile target enchantment.

card.name: Eviscerator
card.text: Protection from white When Eviscerator enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

card.name: Expendable Troops
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Expendable Troops: Expendable Troops deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Faerie Conclave
card.text: Faerie Conclave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {1}{U}: Faerie Conclave becomes a 2/1 blue Faerie creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Fleeting Image
card.text: Flying {1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fog of Gnats
card.text: Flying {B}: Regenerate Fog of Gnats.

card.name: Forbidding Watchtower
card.text: Forbidding Watchtower enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {1}{W}: Forbidding Watchtower becomes a 1/5 white Soldier creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Frantic Search
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.

card.name: Gang of Elk
card.text: Whenever Gang of Elk becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Ghitu Encampment
card.text: Ghitu Encampment enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Ghitu Fire-Eater
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Ghitu Fire-Eater: Ghitu Fire-Eater deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

card.name: Ghitu Slinger
card.text: Echo {2}{R} When Ghitu Slinger enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Ghitu War Cry
card.text: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Medics
card.text: Whenever Goblin Medics becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Goblin Welder
card.text: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

card.name: Granite Grip
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control.

card.name: Grim Monolith
card.text: Grim Monolith doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool. {4}: Untap Grim Monolith.

card.name: Harmonic Convergence
card.text: Put all enchantments on top of their owners' libraries.

card.name: Hidden Gibbons
card.text: When an opponent casts an instant spell, if Hidden Gibbons is an enchantment, Hidden Gibbons becomes a 4/4 Ape creature.

card.name: Hope and Glory
card.text: Untap two target creatures. Each of them gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Impending Disaster
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are seven or more lands on the battlefield, sacrifice Impending Disaster and destroy all lands.

card.name: Intervene
card.text: Counter target spell that targets a creature.

card.name: Iron Maiden
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Iron Maiden deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.

card.name: Iron Will
card.text: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn. Cycling {2}

card.name: Jhoira's Toolbox
card.text: {2}: Regenerate target artifact creature.

King Crab
card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Put target green creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Knighthood
card.text: Creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Last-Ditch Effort
card.text: Sacrifice any number of creatures. Last-Ditch Effort deals that much damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.

card.name: Levitation
card.text: Creatures you control have flying.

card.name: Lone Wolf
card.text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Lurking Skirge
card.text: When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Lurking Skirge is an enchantment, Lurking Skirge becomes a 3/2 Imp creature with flying.

card.name: Martyr's Cause
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Memory Jar
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Memory Jar: Each player exiles all cards from his or her hand face down and draws seven cards. At the beginning of the next end step, each player discards his or her hand and returns to his or her hand each card he or she exiled this way.

card.name: Might of Oaks
card.text: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

card.name: Miscalculation
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Cycling {2}

card.name: Molten Hydra
card.text: {1}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Molten Hydra. {T}, Remove all +1/+1 counters from Molten Hydra: Molten Hydra deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

card.name: Mother of Runes
card.text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Multani, Maro-Sorcerer
card.text: Shroud Multani, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the total number of cards in all players' hands.

card.name: Multani's Acolyte
card.text: Echo {G}{G} When Multani's Acolyte enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Multani's Presence
card.text: Whenever a spell you've cast is countered, draw a card.

card.name: No Mercy
card.text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

card.name: Opal Avenger
card.text: When you have 10 or less life, if Opal Avenger is an enchantment, Opal Avenger becomes a 3/5 Soldier creature.

card.name: Opal Champion
card.text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Champion is an enchantment, Opal Champion becomes a 3/3 Knight creature with first strike.

card.name: Opportunity
card.text: Target player draws four cards.

card.name: Ostracize
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Palinchron
card.text: Flying When Palinchron enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands. {2}{U}{U}: Return Palinchron to its owner's hand.

card.name: Parch
card.text: Choose one - Parch deals 2 damage to target creature or player; or Parch deals 4 damage to target blue creature.

card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.

card.text: Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block. {R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
